title: Mathematics Leadership Project Utilizing an Online Learning Design System

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics concepts and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen information retrieval and knowledge-generation skills during online learning system adoption, with collaborative real-world problem-solving projects.

learning_goals: Learners can complete projects solving math-based business problems with over 80% accuracy using an online learning design system.
Learners can identify and evaluate five or more resources needed for solving mathematical problems by applying information retrieval strategies.
Learners can simulate knowledge generation processes with peer learners and innovation stakeholders using collaboration tools.

resources: Access to Online Learning Design System

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
